title: Florida's Siesta Beach named best beach in the U.S. by TripAdvisor

text:
Florida's Siesta Beach named best beach in the U.S. by TripAdvisor Siesta Beach near Sarasota named best beach in the U.S. 
Siesta Beach has been named the top beach in the U.S. in the 2017 TripAdvisor Travelers' Choice Awards, an honor it received in 2015. The beach near Sarasota on Florida's Gulf Coast is often ranked among the top beaches in both the U.S. and the world.

Three Florida beaches made it onto the 26th annual Top 10 Beach List from Stephen Leatherman, the Director of Florida International University's Laboratory for Coastal Research.
